priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM COPD Findings About Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C122006

self.title: CDISC SDTM COPD Findings About Test Name Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the test names that describe findings about a COPD event or intervention.
name: COPD Findings About Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM COPD Findings About Test Name Terminology

terms.definition: The total amount that a subject is exposed to over time.
The number of times an event, which is classified as mild, occurred.
The number of times an event, which is classified as moderate, occurred.
The number of times an event, which is classified as severe, occurred.
